about.title: About Harmen
about.description: Based in Auckland, New Zealand, I lead cloud and AI engineering teams to deliver scalable, secure, and innovative solutions. My experience spans startups, enterprise, and government, with a focus on cloud-native architecture, automation, and intelligent systems. I thrive on collaboration, technical leadership, and mentoring, and have a proven track record in delivering projects for Amazon, NZTA, Restaurant Brands, and more. Certified AWS Solutions Architect (Professional & Associate).
